title: JSON schema for Typings TypeScript definitions manager

main.description: The entry point to the definition (canonical to `"main"` in NPM's `package.json`).

browser.description: A string, or map of paths, to override during resolution. See spec: https://github.com/defunctzombie/package-browser-field-spec

version.description: The semver range this definition is typed for

files.description: Used as an alternative or to complement `main`, specify an array of files that are exported but aren't already part of the resolution from `main`.

ambient.description: Denote that this definition _must_ be installed as ambient.

postmessage.description: A message to emit to users after typings installation.

dependencies.description: A map of dependencies required by the project.

devDependencies.description: A map of dependencies required by the project during development.

peerDependencies.description: A map of dependencies expected in the parent project for this dependency to work.

ambientDependencies.description: A map of global dependencies required by the project.

ambientDevDependencies.description: A map of global dependencies required by the project during development.
